actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to authorize funds for the American Council of Learned Societies.
short_title: American Council of Learned Societies Endowment Act

summary.text: American Council of Learned Societies Endowment Act- Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to establish an endowment under the control of the American Council of Learned Societies.

titles.title: American Council of Learned Societies Endowment Act
A bill to authorize funds for the American Council of Learned Societies.
